channel.title: A few questions about range
channel.description:
First, how do you change the max hit for certain arrow types
Second, how do you make npcs retaliate vs range, cuz as of right now they just stand there if you range them from a distance.
Third, when using a D bow my arrows do not decrease, how can I fix this?
please help. :)

item.description:
@Project_Evolution wrote:

Second, are your NPCs aggressive?
